name: The Claimer
description:
Hello this is the claimer

~ Keys ~

Character 1 commands: AWSD to move,
SPACE to push,
Z, X, C to SACRIFICE YOUR Relics to the claimer .

Character 2 commands: Arrows to move,
P to push,
U , I , O  to SACRIFICE YOUR Relics to the claimer.

~~~

We had a few problems to make it ready for joysticks. The xbox one joystick was the only one we had, so we have decided to use keyboard, we pretend in the future made the game playable for 4 players at least…
